Container.Name: Rust-Server
Container.Overview: Fully customizable Rust Server at your fingertips. [br] Set all of the settings below to suit your needs and save when you are ready. [br] [br] Features: [br] Automatic updating system with wipe. [br] Auto Port forwarding (UPnP). [br] Simple Template for faster setup (Great for newbies). Auto announcements, upto 5 messages to set. Enable option to show wiped date in server title.
Container.Changes:
[font size=4][center]Rust-Server Change Log[/center][/font]
[font size=3][b]v2.0.9[/b][/font] (2019-07-16) - Temp Fix for Compiler permission issues for some users.
[font size=3][b]v2.0.1[/b][/font] (2018-09-26) - Fixed oxide download issues when updating.
[font size=3][b]v2.0[/b][/font] (2018-08-30) - Added auto wipe system. Oxide not needed. - Added wiped date on title. Oxide not needed. - Added auto announcements. Oxide not needed. - Added auto port forwarding. - Added better docker logging system. - Modified coding to run smoother. - Modified template with extra options.
Container.Description: Fully customizable Rust Server at your fingertips. [br] Set all of the settings below to suit your needs and save when you are ready. [br] [br] Features: [br] Automatic updating system. [br] Auto Port forwarding (UPnP). [br] Simple Template for faster setup (Great for newbies). Auto announcements, upto 5 messages to set. Enable option to show wiped date in server title.

Config.Name: Public
PVE
Config.Description: 1 = Enabled (Player Vs Entities) </br> 0 = Disabled (Player Vs Player)

Config.Name: Auto Maintenance
Auto Wipe
Wipe Date On Title
Oxide Plugin
Performance
Server Release
Config.Description: public = (Latest update) </br> prerelease = (Under development)

Config.Name: Server Name
Config.Description: Enter the server name. </br> This is the name that will show up in Rust server list.

Config.Name: Server Description
Banner URL
Config.Description: Banner must be 512x256 PNG

Config.Name: Max Players
Config.Description: Max amount of players that can join.

Config.Name: Map Size
Rcon Password
Config.Description: Password to access Rcon (Remote Console) </br> Leave blank for unsecure login (Not Recommended)

Config.Name: (ADVANCED) Extra Startup Arguments
Config.Description: Extra rust arguments to be applied when starting up server.

Config.Name: Announce 1
Announce 2
Config.Description: ANNOUNCEMENT 2

Config.Name: Announce 3
Config.Description: ANNOUNCEMENT 3

Config.Name: Announce 4
Config.Description: ANNOUNCEMENT 4

Config.Name: Announce 5
Config.Description: ANNOUNCEMENT 5

Config.Name: Rust Server Directory
Config.Description: Mapping Directory

Config.Name: Web Port
Config.Description: Web host for Rcon

Config.Name: Rcon Port
Config.Description: Container Port:

Config.Name: Port Forward Web
Config.Description: Match this port with (Web Port)

Config.Name: Port Forward Rust
Config.Description: Match this port with (Rust Port)

Config.Name: Port Forward Rcon
Config.Description: Match this port with (Rcon Port)

Config.Name: Map Seed
Config.Description: 0 = Randomises the map terrain etc.. </br> Or enter your own value if you want a consistent map on each wipe.

Config.Name: Server Folder Name
Config.Description: Server folder name, e.g My-server-name

Config.Name: Save Intervals
Config.Description: Value is in seconds.

Config.Name: Announce Delay
Config.Description: Delay in minutes between each announcement.
